typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceItemId as integer,
		name as string,
		{alpha-2} as string,
		{alpha-3} as string,
		{country-code} as string,
		{iso_3166-2} as string,
		region as string,
		{sub-region} as string,
		{intermediate-region} as string,
		{region-code} as string,
		{sub-region-code} as string,
		{intermediate-region-code} as string,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedBy as integer,
		sysCreatedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> outstaginggeography
source(output(
		DimGeographyKey as integer,
		Region as string,
		SubRegion as string,
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedBy as integer,
		sysCreatedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> outdimgeography
outstaginggeography, outdimgeography join({country-code} == CountryCode,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> outmergegeography
outselectaftermerge split(isNull({DimGeographyKey}),
	disjoint: false) ~> outnewitems@(newitems, toupdate)
outmergegeography select(mapColumn(
		name,
		{alpha-2},
		{alpha-3},
		{country-code},
		region = outstaginggeography@region,
		{sub-region},
		DimGeographyKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outselectaftermerge
outnewitems@newitems sink(input(
		DimGeographyKey as integer,
		Region as string,
		SubRegion as string,
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedBy as integer,
		sysCreatedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Region = region,
		SubRegion = {sub-region},
		Country = name,
		CountryCode = {alpha-2}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outnewitemsinsert
